channel.title: Trending on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Trending on NewsStreet

item.title: Ramcharan Teja-Upasana to welcome their first child, RRR star announces
item.description: Ramcharan Teja-Upasana to welcome their first child, RRR star announces Ramcharan and Upasana got engaged on 1st December 2011 and were married on 14th June 2012.

item.title: 10 सेकंड में दो बार जाते-जाते बची शख्स की जान, रोंगटे खड़े कर देगा ये वीडियो
item.description: 10 सेकंड में दो बार जाते-जाते बची शख्स की जान, रोंगटे खड़े कर देगा ये वीडियो इस रोंगटे खड़े कर देने वाले वीडियो को सोशल मीडिया प्लेटफॉर्म ट्विटर पर @OTerrifying नाम की आईडी से शेयर किया गया है.

item.title: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided
item.description: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided Drishti IAS is a civil services coaching centre in New Delhi that provided guidance to prepare exams conducted by UPSC.
